JOB DESCRIPTION: Job Description    In pursuit of this goal, we are looking for full stack software developers to join our technical team as we move from being a tech-enabled service to a tech product company. We are looking for passionate and enthusiastic people who love solving complex business problems and providing excellent technical solutions. If you are passionate about joining a mission-driven, education technology company and creating the future of EdTech, then this role is for you!       What You ll Do:     Collaborate with technical lead to produce software design and architecture.     Write clean, scalable code using .NET programming languages.     Write Stored Procedures     Test and deploy applications and systems     Improve existing software     Develop documentation throughout the software development life cycle (SDLC)     Serve as an expert on applications and provide technical support     Perform code reviews      Qualifications     Education:   B.Tech/ B.E/ MSC    Experience: 3- 5   years only    Location:   Andheri East (Mumbai)    Job Type:   Full Time    What skills you should have:      Excellent analytical, troubleshooting and communication skills     Ability to work under pressure and meet deadlines     Ability to think ahead and anticipate problems, issues and solutions     Work well as a team player and help the team members to resolve issues     Proven experience as a .NET Developer in ASP.NET MVC/ Core     Be committed to quality and structured in approach     Excellent and demonstrable concept formulation, logical and analytical skills     What technical skills are we looking for      NET CORE/ ASP.NET MVC     Angular 4/5/6/7 (IS A MUST)     MSSQL 2008-2016 (Transact SQL, Stored Procedures, Triggers)     Razor/ .Net API/HTML/AJAX     Entity Framework Core/LINQ.     Jquery, Bootstrap     Object oriented programming knowledge is a must.     Experience with cloud computing (Azure) is a plus
